text: Cynthia Wu (; also Wu Hsin-ying; born 18 May 1978) is a Taiwanese business executive and politician. She worked for Merrill Lynch in the United Kingdom and the Shin Kong Group. She was appointed to the Legislative Yuan in 2022. She is the vice presidential nominee of the Taiwan People's Party in the 2024 election as Ko Wen-je's running mate. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Taiwanese politicians Category:Taiwanese businesspeople
title: Cynthia Wu
